org.lindbergframework.core.configuration
Class ClassPathXmlCoreConfiguration

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Configuration, ConfigurationInitializer, CoreConfiguration
Direct Known Subclasses:
WebClassPathXmlCoreConfiguration
public class ClassPathXmlCoreConfiguration
extends XmlCoreConfiguration

Extension of Xml Core Configuration that to work with class path recoursces. The XML schema is defined in http://www.lindbergframework.org/schema/lindberg-config.xsd

Author:
Victor Lindberg
